com.mobilab.accountservice.bussiness.process

Class Database

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.mobilab.accountservice.bussiness.process.Database

  • public class Database
extends java.lang.Object
    MongoDB interface for connection and CRUD operations on accounts and logs

      • createAccount

        public void createAccount(Account account)
                   throws java.lang.Exception
        create a new account if not exists. because the index is on accountNo field, it could not be duplicated.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception

      • readAccount

        public Account readAccount(Account account)
                    throws java.lang.Exception
        read an account
        Parameters:
        account - - contains only the accountNo field
        Returns:
        Account - DB version of account object if exists
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception

      • batchInsert

        public java.util.List<Account> batchInsert(java.util.List<Account> list)
                                    throws java.lang.Exception
        perform batch insert operation on accounts in one transaction. skip accoutns which are duplicated.
        Parameters:
        list - - accounts to be inserted
        Returns:
        DB version of inserted accounts
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception

      • batchRead

        public java.util.List<Account> batchRead(java.util.List<Account> list)
        perform batch read operation in one DB query
        Parameters:
        list - of accounts to be read
        Returns:
        DB version list of accounts that exist in DB

      • batchUpdate

        public java.util.List<Account> batchUpdate(java.util.Map<MyRequest,CurrencyMap> list)
        perform batch update operation on accounts in a single transaction
        Parameters:
        list - of requests
        Returns:
        DB version list of updated state of accounts

        public void insertLog(java.util.Collection<LogEntity> list)

      • searchLog

        public void searchLog(boolean asc,
                      java.lang.Long startTime,
                      java.lang.Long endTime,
                      java.lang.Long transaction,
                      java.lang.String accountNo,
                      java.util.function.Consumer<LogEntity> consumer)
        search logs. perform AND if more than one input are given.
        Parameters:
        asc - - asc order of results by time
        startTime - - time of logs should be after this time- nullable
        endTime - - time of logs should be before this time- nullable
        transaction - - transactionID - nullable
        accountNo - - accountNo of log - nullable
        consumer - - to iterate over results

      • deleteAllLogs

        public void deleteAllLogs()
        delete all the logs
